headline: Is Albemarle Attractively Priced After Recent Lithium Price Weakness?
summary: If you are watching Albemarle stock and wondering whether it is time to buy, sell, or simply sit on your hands, you are not alone. The company’s share price has been on quite a rollercoaster lately. Over the past week, Albemarle declined by 7.3%, extending a tough run with the stock down 7.6% in the past month and a notable 10.9% drop year-to-date. Zooming out, the one-year return sits at -13.1%, and over the last three years, shares have lost a staggering 73.3%. Even the longer five-year...
